Literature.Title: Proteomic analysis of skin defensive factors of tree frog Hyla simplex.
Literature.Author: Wu J, Liu H, Yang H, Yu H, You D, Ma Y, Ye H, Lai R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=5.50µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=5.50µg/ml),Bacillus cereus(MIC=11.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=44.0µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae(MIC=2.75µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=5.50µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=66.0µg/ml)
